other_title: 犬とハサミは使いよう (Japanese)
plot: The absurd comedy centers around Harumi Kazuhito, a high school boy who is obsessed with reading books. One day, he is killed in the middle of a robbery and resurrected as a dog. Unable to read in his new form, the hapless Kazuhito now belongs to Natsuno Kirihime, a sadistic girl who uses scissors like a weapon.
opening_theme: "Wan Wan Wan Wan N_1!!" (わんわんわんわんN_1!!) by Inu Musume Club
ending_theme: "Lemonade Scandal" (レモネイドスキャンダル) by Yū Serizawa
"Wan Wan Wan Wan N_1!!" (わんわんわんわんN_1!!) by Inu Musume Club (ep 12)
insert_song: "KIRA-KIRA Shimashou? (KIRA-KIRA しましょう?;Let's Sparkle, OK?)" by Yū Serizawa (ep 12)
